Woodular Shrine.desc: Boosts Total Damage of players on this map by +%. @ AFK Time to next Lv: @

Isaccian Shrine.desc: Boosts Max HP and DEF of players on this map by +%. @ AFK Time to next Lv: @

Crystal Shrine.desc: Boosts the Lv Up Rate of all Shrines on this map by +%. @ AFK Time to next Lv: @

Pantheon Shrine.desc: Boosts Carry Capacity of players on this map by +%. @ AFK Time to next Lv: @

Clover Shrine.desc: Boosts Drop Rate of players on this map by +%. @ AFK Time to next Lv: @

Summereading Shrine.desc: Boosts ALL Exp Gain of players on this map by +%. @ AFK Time to next Lv: @

Crescent Shrine.desc: Boosts Crystal and Giant Spawn chance on this map by +%. @ AFK Time to next Lv: @

Undead Shrine.desc: Boosts Respawn Rate of monsters on this map by +%. @ AFK Time to next Lv: @

Primordial Shrine.desc: Boosts AFK Gain Rate on this map by +%, up to 80% total. @ AFK Time to next Lv: @
